about_the_game:
Step into the world of Enchanted Path, an atmospheric isometric puzzler that will test your strategy and precision. In this puzzle adventure, your goal is to collect glowing green crystals to unlock the portal that leads you to the next level. But be careful—one wrong step and you could fall into the abyss!

Explore a grid of magical tiles, each with unique mechanics. Some tiles vanish the moment you step off them, others will teleport you across the map, while some can even create new pathways. As you progress through 40 increasingly challenging levels, new tiles and obstacles will be introduced, keeping you on your toes.

Key Features:

  • Challenging Puzzle Gameplay: Navigate complex puzzles that require strategic thinking and smart movement.

  • 40 Unique Levels: With each level, the difficulty increases, introducing new mechanics and obstacles.

  • Engaging Tile Mechanics: Discover disappearing tiles, teleporters, cages, and tiles that create more paths.

  • Atmospheric Visuals: Immerse yourself in the game's captivating isometric design and magical environments.

  • Casual and Relaxing: Perfect for those who love laid-back puzzle games with increasing difficulty.

  • Achievements and Cloud Saves: Track your progress, earn achievements, and continue your adventure across different devices.

Find the right path, outsmart the puzzles, and make your way to the next portal. Will you uncover the mysteries of the Enchanted Path?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3632QM CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7500M/7600M Series
  • Storage: 87 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz x 4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 (Skylake GT2)
  • Storage: 87 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs

name: Enchanted Path

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB Graphics
  • Storage: 85 MB available space

short_description: Enchanted Path is a fun and unique puzzle game in which you must control a man who is traveling through a series of enchanted portals! Watch out as the tiles can fall away beneath your feet so you must move quickly and not make any wrong moves!
